job.title: Senior Go Developer
job.description: We are on a mission to make Bitcoin the go-to savings technology - simple, accessible, and secure. As Europe's leading Bitcoin startup, we're pioneering the future of Bitcoin investing by making it effortless for individuals and institutions alike to buy, sell, and hold Bitcoin without complexity or middlemen.
responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain high-quality backend microservices using Go, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, DevOps engineers, and QA/test engineers
Participate in code reviews and audits, providing constructive feedback to maintain high standards
Optimize application performance, ensuring efficient use of resources and minimal latency
Contribute to architecture decisions for distributed systems
Implement and maintain APIs, ensuring seamless communication between services
Troubleshoot and resolve production-level issues quickly and effectively
Stay up to date with Go best practices and industry trends
requirements: 5+ years of professional experience in backend development
3+ years of hands-on experience with Go (Golang)
Strong preference for simple, iterative solutions
Self-starter mindset, capable of working independently
Proven experience in API development (RESTful or gRPC)
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools
Experience working in an agile environment
Solid knowledge of cloud and microservice design patterns
nice_to_have: Experience with Bitcoin or cryptocurrency systems
Knowledge of financial systems and regulations
benefits: 100% remote work - fully remote, flexible team across Europe
Latest MacBook laptop and iPhone provided
Senior role in fast-growing Bitcoin company
